refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: ifx_close closes the link to an Informix database that's associated with the specified link identifier. If the link identifier isn't specified, the last opened link is assumed.
Note that this isn't usually necessary, as non-persistent open links are automatically closed at the end of the script's execution.
ifx_close will not close persistent links generated by ifx_pconnect.

example.title: Closing a Informix connection
example.programlisting:
<?php
$conn_id = ifx_connect ("mydb@ol_srv", "itsme", "mypassword");
/* ... some queries and stuff ... */
ifx_close($conn_id);
?>
